basics.name: Cuong Chung
basics.label: Engineering Manager
summary: 10+ years of experience in software development including project management, technical. An excellent problem solver with the ability to learn the latest technology and adapt to the new environment.
I have 5+ years of managing teams of 5 - 30 people from diverse backgrounds and age groups.experience from building long lasting teams from scratch (hiring, training, & supervising).

location.address: 9 Street No , An Lac Ward, Binh Tan

work.name: Rowboat Software Company
highlights: Manage the people and provide technical leadership to a development team working on internal and external products, including back-end and front-end systems.
Directly report to the Technology Director in the US.
Oversee and manage the engineering team in Vietnam.
In charge of recruiting, mentoring, and developing our engineering team in order to build a high-performance engineering organization.
Assist in the development of engineering technical strategy and roadmaps.
Line management (1:1 meetings, personal development and training plans, career paths, probation reviews, and performance evaluations).
Manage action plans for team continuous improvement (Team Health Monitor, sprint backlogs and plans, engineers' responsibilities and performance management, code quality, and so on).
Create a culture that is open, positive, and energized.

work.name: Vitalify Asia
highlights: Recruit great people for the Engineering team.
Ensure members have sufficient resources and support to do their best work .
Ensure the team follows processes- Contribute to technical training and development courses for Engineering team.
Collaborate closely with the Leader , PM and Members to support the performance and engagement of team members.
Collaborate with development team to troubleshoot and resolve issues.
Helped the team to uplift development skills, process and coding quality.
Manage around 30 staffs and deliver performance reviews of team members in a fair, accurate and timely manner.
Managed software project delivery to develop websites, mobile applications.
Setup Agile Scrum process for software development.

work.name: Vitalify Asia
highlights: Worked with Ruby on Rails and reported directly with clients.
Using AWS to build mirco-service (API Gateway, Lambda, S3, EC2…).
Optimizing performance of the system.
Review performances for individual team members and the whole team, give suggestions for improvement.
Provide the solution for solving problems.
Hands-on tasks on system design, coding, and installation/deployment.
Worked closely with development team to develop, test, and deploy solution into client’s environments.
Manage timeline and process of a work.
Setup Agile Scrum process for software development.
